title: Minecraft Pack Metadata
description: Configuration file defining the metadata of a resource / data pack for Minecraft

language.description:
Language code for a language, corresponding to a .json file with the same name in the folder
assets/namespace/lang.

name.description: The full name of the language

bidirectional.description: If true, the language reads right to left.

pack.description: Holds the resource / data pack information

description.description:
Text shown below the pack name in the resource / data pack menu.
The text is shown on two lines.
If the text is too long it is truncated.
Contains a raw JSON text object that is shown instead as the pack description in the resource / data pack menu

pack_format.description:
Pack version.
If this number does not match the current required number, the resource / data pack displays an error and requires additional confirmation to load the pack
1 for 1.6.1–1.8.9
2 for 1.9–1.10.2
3 for 1.11–1.12.2
4 for 1.13–1.14.4
5 for 1.15–1.16.1
6 for 1.16.2–1.16.5
7 for 1.17

language.description:
Contains additional languages to add to the language menu
Resource pack ONLY
